item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会唯一的民主党委员确定离职日期
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会（Commodity Futures Trading Commission）中唯一的民主党人、该机构仅剩的两名委员之一周二表示，她将于 9 月 3 日离开监管机构。【原文：The lone Democrat on the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission, and one of just two remaining commissioners at the agency, said on Tuesday that she will leave the regulator on September 3.】

item.title: 美国商务部确认对 10 个国家征收反倾销税
item.description: 美国商务部在对耐腐蚀钢产品进行调查后，于周二发布了针对 10 个国家的反倾销和反补贴税的肯定性裁定。【原文：The U.S. Department of Commerce on Tuesday issued affirmative determinations of anti-dumping and countervailing duties against 10 countries after investigations into corrosion-resistant steel products.】

item.title: 贝森特称美国关税收入每年可能远超 5000 亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税带来的关税收入每年可能高达 5000 亿美元，其中 7 月至 8 月大幅飙升，9 月的飙升幅度可能更大。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday that customs duty revenues from President Donald Trump's tariffs may top $500 billion a year, with a substantial jump from July to August and likely a bigger jump in September.】

item.title: 特朗普撤换美联储理事的努力将考验国债市场
item.description: 由于担心过于鸽派的美国央行可能会失去对通胀的控制，美国债券投资者预计唐纳德-特朗普总统对美联储施加控制的最新尝试将推低美国长期债券的价值。【原文：U.S. bond investors expect President Donald Trump's latest attempt to exert control over the Federal Reserve to push down the value of long-dated U.S. debt on concerns that an overly dovish U.S. central bank may lose its grip on inflation.】

item.title: 部长表示，加拿大和盟国将探索为关键矿产项目提供资金
item.description: 加拿大能源与自然资源部长蒂姆-霍奇森（Tim Hodgson）周二告诉路透社记者，加拿大正在与盟国合作，为关键矿产交易提供潜在资金，类似于美国政府与MP材料公司合作，使来自中国的供应链多样化。【原文：Canada is working with its allies to potentially fund critical mineral transactions, similar to what the U.S. government did with MP Materials to diversify the supply chain from China, Energy and Natural Resources Minister Tim Hodgson told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 边疆航空公司关注美国主要市场的增长
item.description: 边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）首席执行官巴里-比弗尔（Barry Biffle）周二表示，由于竞争对手精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）的财务问题和西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）决定终止允许免费托运行李的政策，这家廉价航空公司看到了扩大市场份额的机会。【原文：Frontier Airlines CEO Barry Biffle said on Tuesday the budget carrier is seeing an opportunity to grow its market share, thanks to financial troubles at rival Spirit Airlines and Southwest Airlines' decision to end its policy of allowing free checked bags.】

item.title: OpenAI和Altman因ChatGPT在加州青少年自杀事件中的作用而被起诉
item.description: 一名青少年在 ChatGPT 指导下学习自残方法后自杀身亡，其父母周二起诉 OpenAI 和首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman），称该公司在去年推出 GPT-4o 版人工智能聊天机器人时，故意将利润置于安全之上。【原文：The parents of a teen who died by suicide after ChatGPT coached him on methods of self harm sued OpenAI and CEO Sam Altman on Tuesday, saying the company knowingly put profit above safety when it launched the GPT-4o version of its artificial intelligence chatbot last year.】

item.title: 美国法院裁定，"F "字商标申请失败应重新审查
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周二命令美国专利商标局重新考虑其拒绝涉及淫秽词汇 "fuck "的商标申请的决定。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Tuesday ordered the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office to reconsider its decision to deny an application for a trademark covering the obscenity word "fuck."】

item.title: Anthropic 就美国作家提出的侵犯版权集体诉讼达成和解
item.description: 人工智能公司 Anthropic 周二在一份法庭文件中表示，该公司已与一群美国作家的集体诉讼达成和解，这些作家认为该公司的人工智能训练侵犯了他们的版权。【原文：Artificial intelligence company Anthropic said in a court filing on Tuesday it had settled a class action lawsuit from a group of U.S. authors who argued the company's AI training infringed their copyrights.】

item.title: 据 Politico 报道，Meta 将启动加州超级政治行动委员会，支持支持人工智能的候选人
item.description: 据 Politico 周二报道，Meta 正在成立一个新的以加利福尼亚州为重点的政治行动委员会（PAC），以支持州一级支持放宽对技术，尤其是人工智能监管的候选人。【原文：Meta is setting up a new California-focused political action committee (PAC) to back state-level candidates favoring lighter regulation of technology, particularly artificial intelligence, Politico reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 机构称，Stellantis 今年支付了 1.906 亿美元的美国燃油经济性罚款
item.description: 据一份政府报告和这家意大利-美国汽车制造商称，克莱斯勒母公司斯泰兰特今年因未达到美国燃油经济性要求而支付了 1.906 亿美元的罚款。【原文：Chrysler-parent Stellantis paid $190.6 million in penalties this year for not meeting U.S. fuel economy requirements, according to a government report and the Italian-U.S. automaker.】

item.title: 巴西牛脂需求上升，出口受美国关税影响
item.description: 行业消息人士称，巴西用于生产生物柴油的牛脂用量预计将增加，因为预计国内销售量将增加，从而提高生物燃料的产量。【原文：The use of beef tallow for biodiesel production in Brazil is expected to rise amid a forecast increase in domestic sales aimed at boosting output of the biofuel, industry sources said, noting a rise in beef tallow's domestic use would also offset a likely drop in U.S. import demand after the imposition of tariffs on Brazilian beef and byproducts.】

item.title: Critical Metals 公司签署协议，向美国政府资助的设施供应稀土
item.description: 临界金属公司（Critical Metals）周二表示，该公司已签署一项为期 10 年的协议，向 Ucore Rare Metal 公司在美国政府资助下在路易斯安那州建立的加工厂供应重稀土精矿。【原文：Critical Metals on Tuesday said it has signed a 10-year agreement to supply heavy rare earth concentrate to Ucore Rare Metal's U.S. government-funded Louisiana processing facility.】

item.title: 苹果公司将于 9 月 9 日举行秋季发布会，预计将推出新款 iPhone
item.description: 苹果公司周二表示，将于 9 月 9 日举办一年一度的秋季新品发布会，预计届时将发布新款 iPhone、手表和其他设备。【原文：Apple said on Tuesday it would host its annual fall event on September 9, when the company is expected to unveil new iPhones, watches and other devices.】

item.title: 特朗普对库克采取行动后，美联储仍有望在 9 月降息
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统试图解雇美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook），这不太可能影响美国中央银行下个月的降息之路，但在美联储的独立性受到前所未有的攻击的情况下，这给会议之后的情况带来了新的不确定性。【原文：President Donald Trump's attempt to fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook is unlikely to affect the U.S. central bank's path toward cutting interest rates next month, but it creates new uncertainties about what happens after that meeting amid the unprecedented attack on the Fed's independence.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局计划在取消波音 737 MAX 生产上限前进行桌面演习
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局局长周二表示，该局计划与波音公司进行桌面演习，然后再考虑取消每月生产38架737 MAX飞机的上限。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration said Tuesday the agency plans to conduct tabletop exercises with Boeing before it will consider lifting the 38-plane per month cap on 737 MAX production.】

item.title: 国际清算银行新行长强调中央银行独立性和问责制的重要性
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）新任行长在其首次重要讲话中强调，中央银行必须关注通货膨胀，并保护其独立于政客的地位。【原文：The new head of the Bank for International Settlements has used his first prominent speech to stress the need for central banks to focus on inflation and for their independence from politicians to be protected.】

item.title: Polymarket 加入小特朗普为顾问委员会成员，1789 资本进行投资
item.description: Polymarket 周二表示，美国总统之子小唐纳德-特朗普已加入其顾问委员会，1789 资本也已对该预测市场进行了战略投资。【原文：Polymarket said on Tuesday Donald Trump Jr., son of the U.S. president, has joined its advisory board, and that 1789 Capital has made a strategic investment in the prediction market.】

item.title: 欧盟拒绝接受特朗普关于针对美国科技的不公平数字规则的说法
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二驳斥了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关于欧盟数字服务规则不公平地针对美国科技公司的批评，并否认这些规则等同于审查。【原文：The European Commission rejected on Tuesday U.S. President Donald Trump's criticism that EU digital services rules unfairly target U.S. tech companies and denied they amounted to censorship.】

item.title: 特朗普敦促饼干桶恢复旧标识
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二呼吁 Cracker Barrel Old Country Store 恢复其旧标识，对该餐饮公司正在进行的品牌改造努力进行了权衡，这一努力引发了反弹并打击了其股价。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday called on Cracker Barrel Old Country Store to go back to its old logo, weighing in on the restaurant company's ongoing effort to revamp its brand that triggered a backlash and hit its shares.】

item.title: 美联储的信誉是一种资产，其衰落可能代价高昂
item.description: 在 2021 年通胀飙升时，美联储可能迟迟没有加息，但在此期间对通胀预期的衡量显示，人们普遍认为物价会降温，这使得这场斗争变得更加容易，成本也更低，债券市场甚至在美国央行上调借贷成本之前就收紧了金融条件。【原文：The Federal Reserve may have been late raising interest rates as inflation surged in 2021, but measures of inflation expectations throughout that period showed broad belief that prices would cool, a fact that made the battle easier and less costly to wage, with bond markets even tightening financial conditions well before the U.S. central bank hiked borrowing costs.】

item.title: Trump Media 和 Crypto.com 宣布达成协议，成立加密货币金库公司
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）和 Crypto.com 表示，他们计划成立一家公司，实施一种宝库式的战略，以积累 Crypto.com 的原生代币--cronos，从而加深美国总统与加密货币行业的联系。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group and Crypto.com have said they plan to launch a company that will implement a treasury-style strategy to accumulate Crypto.com's native token, cronos, deepening the U.S. president's ties to the crypto industry.】

item.title: 特朗普关税提高成本，美国卡车制造商寻找掩护
item.description: 特朗普政府的关税提高了价值 500 亿美元的美国重型卡车行业的制造成本，促使企业考虑从墨西哥采购更多零部件，以享受《美国-墨西哥-加拿大协定》（USMCA）的优惠政策。【原文：The Trump administration's tariffs have raised manufacturing costs for the $50 billion U.S. heavy-duty truck industry, prompting companies to consider sourcing more components from Mexico to benefit from concessions under the US-Mexico-Canada Agreement (USMCA).】

item.title: Capital One-Discover 交易导致美国银行业利润下滑：美国联邦存款保险公司
item.description: 第二季度，Capital One 和 Discover Financial 完成合并，拖累了银行利润，银行业利润为 699 亿美元，比上一季度下降了 1%。【原文：The completed merger between Capital One and Discover Financial weighed down bank profits in the second quarter, as the sector reported $69.9 billion in profits, down 1% from the quarter prior.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，苹果公司内部讨论了收购 Mistral、Perplexity 的事宜
item.description: 据《信息报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司内部已经就收购法国人工智能初创公司Mistral以及Perplexity举行了会谈。【原文：Apple has held talks internally about acquiring French AI startup Mistral as well as Perplexity, the Information reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞安航空与 Booking.com 在长期法律纠纷后达成机票协议
item.description: 瑞安航空（Ryanair）周二表示，该公司已与 Booking Holdings 达成协议，允许其 Booking.com 和 KAYAK 网站转售瑞安航空的机票，这显然为双方在此问题上长达数年的法律纠纷划清了界线。【原文：Ryanair has struck a deal with Booking Holdings to let its Booking.com and KAYAK websites resell the airline's tickets, the companies said on Tuesday, apparently drawing a line under their years-long legal dispute over the issue.】

item.title: 金丝雀资本申请上市特朗普纪念币 ETF
item.description: 数字资产管理公司金丝雀资本（Canary Capital）周二申请上市一只交易所交易基金，该基金将跟踪美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的纪念币（名为 $TRUMP）的价格。【原文：Digital asset manager Canary Capital on Tuesday filed to list an exchange-traded fund that will track the price of U.S. President Donald Trump's meme coin, called $TRUMP.】

item.title: RTX 的普惠公司获得 28 亿美元的 F135 发动机合同
item.description: RTX 的普惠公司（Pratt & Whitney）周二表示，该公司获得了一份价值 28 亿美元的 F135 发动机生产合同。【原文：RTX's Pratt & Whitney has been awarded a $2.8 billion contract action for production of its F135 engines, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国商务部长表示，美国可能寻求分拆国防公司
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周二为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统推动联邦政府参股与其有业务往来的美国公司的做法辩护，称这一做法可能会进入国防工业。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick on Tuesday defended President Donald Trump's push for the federal government to take stakes in U.S. companies it does business with, saying it could move into the defense industry.】

item.title: 英国德本汉姆斯集团预计上半年核心盈利将有所增长
item.description: 英国在线时尚零售商德本汉姆（Debenhams）集团周二表示，随着其扭亏为盈战略的推进，预计2026财年上半年持续经营业务的核心盈利将超过去年同期水平。【原文：British online fashion retailer Debenhams Group said on Tuesday it expects its first-half fiscal 2026 core earnings from continuing operations to exceed the year-ago levels, as it advances its turnaround strategy.】
